div.p: The Silvis School District has a strong commitment to providing students with a rigorous, well- rounded education in a caring and supportive environment. A continuous improvement drives the change process in our district.

img.h4: Explore George O. Barr Elementary School
img.div: George O. Barr Elementary School offers large and small group instruction and opportunities for students to demonstrate mastery in a multitude of ways.

img.alt: Northeast Jr. High School
img.div: Northeast Junior High School uses Project Based Learning and the 35 acres the school sits on to students’ advantage.

div.p: The Silvis School District has a team of dedicated professionals working together to ensure every student in the district receives the best possible education.

img.alt: Departments Collage graphic

img.div: While the nation and our public education system have changed a lot in the last one hundred years, one factor—family engagement—remains critical to student achievement.

Members, policies, required postings, meetings and more. School Board meetings are generally held on the third Wednesday of each month. Agendas, minutes, and financial information are posted each month.

The Silvis School District is devoted to recruiting, supporting, and retaining the most qualified and competent faculty and staff. We welcome you to apply for a position in our district, using the Applitrack online application system.
